paper_abstract: In this paper we study the existence of global self-similar solutions of nonlinear beam equations with nonlinear terms vertical bar u vertical bar(alpha-1)u. By using a scaling technique and the Banach fixed point theorem, we first establish a general existence result. By using this general result to a special class of initial data we obtain the existence of global self-similar solutions. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Global solutions and self-similar solutions for nonlinear beam equations
